TopicTitle: Changing WSAD keybindings to arrow keys

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm not sure if this has been mentioned already but I'm trying to replicate my KSP 1 keybinding, where instead of using WSAD, I use the Up, Down, Left Right arrow keys on the right-hand side of the keyboard. However, every time I try to change the keybinding, to one of the arrow keys, the game defaults to PRINT SCREEN PRINT SCREEN for the keybinding.

Has anyone else experienced this?

Hey!

I use the arrow keys as well, and I was able to correctly rebind them, but the camera pan is hard bound to the arrows, so it's currently unplayable with these keys...

Ditto - as a south-paw, for years in KSP I've used arrow keys for translation and num-pad for rotation. Tried the same in KSP2 but no-go. Arrow keys are hard-set to cam controls. One can hope that eventually we'll be able to rebind cam-keys.
